datasource: Brandeis Now Brandeis Now 2010-12-06 11:29:00 Messiah Sing is returning to campus center Dec. 8 The beloved Brandeis tradition, Messiah Sing, returns to the Shapiro Campus Center atrium on Wednesday, Dec. 8. All members of the Brandeis community, as well as family and friends, are welcome to celebrate the holiday season with the sing-along concert of Handel?s masterwork "Messiah." The one-hour concert will begin at 4:30 p.m. http://www.brandeis.edu/now/2010/december/messiah.html
